api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/rdcer/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"UID\":\"123412341234\",\"final_doc_reg_no\":\"2019/RANR/1234/BK1/1234\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/rdcer/certificate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("apisetu.gov.in")

payload = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"regno\":\"1\",\"sro_id\":\"Barhi,Bokaro,Bundu,Chaibasa,Chakradharpur,Chandil,Chatra,Deoghar,Dhanbad,Dumka,Dumri,Garhwa,Ghatshil\",\"yr\":\"20XX\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

headers = {
    'X-APISETU-APIKEY': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/enibandhanjh/v3/regrii/certificate", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/regrii/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"regno\":\"1\",\"sro_id\":\"Barhi,Bokaro,Bundu,Chaibasa,Chakradharpur,Chandil,Chatra,Deoghar,Dhanbad,Dumka,Dumri,Garhwa,Ghatshil\",\"yr\":\"20XX\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

  ],

          "unit": "string",

] as [String : Any]

best_instruction.candidate: I need to verify a marriage certificate. Please help me with this using the Revenue, Registration & Land Reforms Department API in Jharkhand. (Specifically, I will use the verification functionality for marriage certificates.)

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("apisetu.gov.in")

payload = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"regno\":\"1\",\"sro_id\":\"Barhi,Bokaro,Bundu,Chaibasa,Chakradharpur,Chandil,Chatra,Deoghar,Dhanbad,Dumka,Dumri,Garhwa,Ghatshil\",\"yr\":\"20XX\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

headers = {
    'X-APISETU-APIKEY': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/enibandhanjh/v3/rmcer/certificate", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/rmcer/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"regno\":\"1\",\"sro_id\":\"Barhi,Bokaro,Bundu,Chaibasa,Chakradharpur,Chandil,Chatra,Deoghar,Dhanbad,Dumka,Dumri,Garhwa,Ghatshil\",\"yr\":\"20XX\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/rmcer/certificate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-APISETU-APIKEY"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"regno\":\"1\",\"sro_id\":\"Barhi,Bokaro,Bundu,Chaibasa,Chakradharpur,Chandil,Chatra,Deoghar,Dhanbad,Dumka,Dumri,Garhwa,Ghatshil\",\"yr\":\"20XX\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    "yr": "20XX"
  ],
  "consentArtifact": [
    "consent": [
      "consentId": "ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba",
      "data": ["id": "string"],

          "from": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",

        ],
        "frequency": [

          "unit": "string",
          "value": 0
        ]
      ],
      "purpose": ["description": "string"],

      "user": [
        "email": "string",
        "idNumber": "string",
        "idType": "string",
        "mobile": "string"
      ]
    ],
    "signature": ["signature": "string"]
  ],
  "format": "pdf",
  "txnId": "f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7"
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "https://apisetu.gov.in/enibandhanjh/v3/rmcer/certificate")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,

request.httpMethod = "POST"

request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared

  }
})
